definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"/><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">the if statement is used because if the item in slot 201 is Air, I think it could cause an error this avoids that by adding a new paper item if there is not one already in slot 201</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="compare_mcitems"><value name="a"><block type="gui_get_item_inslot"><value name="slotid"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">201</field><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">201 is used so hopefully the player never can access this slot number</comment></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:BASENameItem</field><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">the item used dosnt matter the only thing that matters is its name, since nbt tags dont work, items can store names but its a workaround. A custom item that despaws itself ensures the player can never access this dropped item</comment></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="return_string"><value name="return"><block type="item_name"><value name="item"><block type="gui_get_item_inslot"><value name="slotid"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">201</field><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">201 is used so hopefully the player never can access this slot number</comment></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value></block></value></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="block_inv_set_items"><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:BASENameItem</field></block></value><value name="slotid"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">201</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><next><block type="item_set_display_name"><value name="item"><block type="gui_get_item_inslot"><value name="slotid"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">201</field><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">201 is used so hopefully the player never can access this slot number</comment></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><value name="displayname"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Base</field></block></value></block></next></block></statement><next><block type="return_string"><value name="return"><block type="item_name"><value name="item"><block type="gui_get_item_inslot"><value name="slotid"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">201</field><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">201 is used so hopefully the player never can access this
